message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $110 for it.
I understand that $150 might be a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $130.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $115 for the product.
I'm still willing to work with you, Bob. I'm willing to take a small step back and offer the product to you for $125.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to pay $118 for the product.
I'm getting close to the minimum I'm willing to accept. I'm willing to meet you at $122.
I'm really close to my budget, and I'm willing to meet you at $120. That's the most I'm willing to pay.
